description:
Inuyasha and the gang arrive in the land of fire. They discover a giant gateway within a cave in the mountains.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Anoyo to no Sakai ni Iyou na Monban
Bizarre Guards at the Border of the Afterlife
Die sonderbaren Torwächter an der Grenze zum Jenseits
あの世との境に異様な門番
